title: Istanbul
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Turkish cuisine restaurant by the terminal of Paraty. The owner, who speaks English, creates a main dish of the day that is often vegan suitable. Other veg items include the usual such as falafel, baba ganoush, salads. Has brown rice. Go around noon when the food is freshly made in front of you.
streetAddress: R. Manoel Torres, Rio de Janeiro
